title: Graphical Identity
description: Here you will find everything you need to use our graphical identity correctly. If you have any questions or need help, do not hesitate to contact KomN.
keywords: graphical identity, documents, iconography, colors, typography
iconography.logos.dark_text.description: Used for light or neutral backgrounds.
colors.description: The colors used in the graphical identity are defined in the CMYK color space, but are also displayed in hexadecimal values for ease of use.
typography.figtree: Main use across the website. Used in headings and body text.
typography.jetbrains_mono: Main use in code snippets and code blocks. Used in body text.
typography.helvetica: Main use in the chapters documents. Used in headings and body text.
typography.georgia: Main use in body text and headings.
typography.helvetica_neue: Main use in logos for committees and organizations.
typography.trebuchet_ms: Main use in body text and captions.
